artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Openweave warp stripes in various threads and textures. Loose Plain weave. Warp stripes in orange, white, brown, tan, rust. Weft is brown & tan. Two selvedge edges. (orange, white, brown, tan, rust)

title: Cornsilk - Development and Sampling
